attributes.action: We want state that we Voted Leave even if there is No Deal.
attributes.additional_details: I know I speak for a large proportion of the electorate in being fed up of hearing politicians and other vested parties declaring the reasons why we voted to leave, and how we absolutely wouldn't want to leave with No Deal.  Well, it simply isn't true, and this Petition aims to give the common man an opportunity to put the record straight.
attributes.background: Politicians are fond of saying what we voted for in the referendum, and what we didn't want to happen. But we desire to make it clear that we expect Parliament and this Government, and any successive Government, to fulfil what was promised, viz., that we will leave the E.U. come what may.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to consider signing one of these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243319
